howToSpendBonusesDescription: Order your favorite dishes at Sandyq restaurants or Tary coffee shops and pay via the Sandyq Prime app. When paying, choose how many bonuses you want to spend — bonuses can cover up to 50% of your order.
name: Name
nothingHereYetDescription: Your notifications will be stored here
describeTheProblemQuestion: Describe your problem or ask a question
areYouAtTaryCoffee: Are you at the Tary Coffee Shop?
taryCoffeeDescription1: To order a drink to go, scan the QR code at the bar
taryCoffeeDescription2: To enjoy a drink in the establishment, scan the QR code on the table
scanQrTable: Scan the QR code on the table
scanQRcodeDescription: Point the camera at the QR code to order or pay
getFreeDrink: You can get a free drink!
benefitsAvailable: All the benefits are available to you
deleteAccountQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
sentCodeNumber: We sent the code to the number
bonusesForFriend: +1,000 bonuses for you and your friend
sendBonuses: You and a friend that you refer will get 1000 bonuses after their first payment in the app
forExample: For example: “I want to spend several hours in the establishment”, or “I need high chairs for a child”
restaurantWillContact: The restaurant will contact you if there are any questions regarding your reservation.
promocodeCopied: Promo code has been copied, share it with a friend!
aboutCompany: Restaurant chain 'Chayla Group' is a company that has been on the market for 5 years, currently the chain includes 12 projects. Main activity: Restaurant activities and provision of food delivery services
coffeLimit: You've already redeemed your free drink today.
afterThisPeriod: after this period, access to all PRIME privileges will end.
accessWillEnd: Access to free drinks, increased cashback and gifts will end at the end of the paid period
thanksForUsingPrime: Thanks for using Prime! You can always sign up again to restore your benefits.
requestSentDesc: Thank you for letting us know about the problem!

freeDrinkSuccess: The employee will bring the drink to the place of order as soon as it is ready

feedbackSent: Feedback sent, thank you for your time!

additionalRequests: Check the details and inform the restaurant if you have additional requests
forExampleAdditional: For example: “I want to stay for several hours,” or “We need high chairs for children.”

additionalInformationRestaurant: We need additional information to prepare for your large group. Please contact the restaurant.

checkWithOrder: You will receive the receipt together with your order
